item.title: By: Ghiest
item.dc:creator: Ghiest
item.content:encoded:
We have had about 3-4 accounts hacked in the guild, each one has just contacted a gm and rolled with the punches. Taking it to court to only get laughed at and paying stupid court costs is just, well stupid.

In the immortal words of black adder,

“Cry me a river, build a bridge and get over it.”

item.title: By: blachawk
item.dc:creator: blachawk
item.description: There is definitely cause for action, unfortunately for the poster it would be small claims. Good luck getting the authorities and Blizzard to cooperate, track down the guy, and serve him with a summons.
item.content:encoded: There is definitely cause for action, unfortunately for the poster it would be small claims. Good luck getting the authorities and Blizzard to cooperate, track down the guy, and serve him with a summons.

item.title: By: Heather
item.dc:creator: Heather
item.description: Yeah, everyone I know who got their account hacked got their stuff back. All it takes is a bit of patience.
item.content:encoded: Yeah, everyone I know who got their account hacked got their stuff back. All it takes is a bit of patience.

item.title: By: Random Poster
item.dc:creator: Random Poster
item.description: Oh and what's the big frikkin deal, you put in your ticket you wait however long get your stuff back.
item.content:encoded: Oh and what’s the big frikkin deal, you put in your ticket you wait however long get your stuff back.

item.title: By: Random Poster
item.dc:creator: Random Poster
item.description: Well if he lived in Korea maybe he could, but sadly I think that mangled mess of the English language is a product of the American school system.
item.content:encoded: Well if he lived in Korea maybe he could, but sadly I think that mangled mess of the English language is a product of the American school system.
